attributes.additional_details: The fees for university were £1000 in 1998...how times have changed how can you justify £9000 today?
attributes.background: Students on majority of course are now forced to pay £9000 a year to go and study for their career, a 3/4 year course leaves students with £36,000 debt before their career has even started! Lets fight against this! Many student do even get theres moneys worth or the services they paid for.
